answers.answer: Hi,This sounds like a nerve related problem. At this point, we can not exactly tell what could be causing this. I suggest that you seek consult with your neurologist for a complete neurologic and physical examination. This may not be something urgent however,I do understand that this could be discomforting.Have you any other associated conditions like diabetes for instance?Other differentials to consider will be hormonal imbalance like thyroid problems and nutritional deficiencies like vitamin B6 and B12 deficiencies. Do you  follow a particular diet for the moment?

question: I have no idea where to post this question of mine.Often times I have found myself trying to dry off my left leg below the knee because I thought I felt my leg get wet.  It is so annoying!!! There is nothing I could see on my leg and every brush I do, my hand ends up being dry, not wet.  What could be the possible cause of this???Thanks,Me
title: Cold/Wet Feeling on an area on my leg
